home.title: SafeNet
home.subtitle: Building Digital Literacy & Preventing Online Violence
home.tagline: Learn to stay safe online, detect harmful behavior early, and build a positive digital community
home.mission_description: SafeNet empowers individuals with digital literacy tools and knowledge to stay safe, identify risks, and navigate online spaces confidently. We're committed to preventing digital violence before it begins.
home.detect_report_desc: Identify harmful behavior early and report incidents confidentially. Your voice matters.
home.support_care_desc: Access immediate support and resources for victims and survivors of digital violence.
home.community_focus_desc: Build a positive, inclusive online community with educational resources and peer support.
home.digital_rights_desc: Strengthen your digital rights and learn about safety accountability measures.
home.prevention_desc: We focus on educating individuals about digital risks and teaching preventive strategies before problems occur.
home.education_desc: Through comprehensive courses and resources, we empower users to make informed decisions and protect themselves.
home.community_support_desc: We provide a supportive network with access to professional help, legal resources, and peer support for those affected by digital violence.
home.ready_description: Join thousands of users building digital literacy and creating a safer online community.
